title: Black Hole Sun
description: A caffeinated twist on an Old Fashioned from Houston's Black Hole coffee shop.
recipe:
- Bourbon: 2 oz
- Cold Brew Coffee: 1/2 oz
- Simple Syrup: 1/2 oz
- Chocolate Bitters: 2 dashes
- Orange Bitters: 2 dashes
- Agnostura Bitters: 1 dash

Combine ingredients in a glass. Stir and add ice.

title: Black Manhattan
description: A Manhattan with an amaro twist.
recipe:
- Bourbon: 2 oz
- Montenegro: 1 oz
- Agnostura Bitters: 2 dashes

Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a glass.

title: Lion's Tail
description: Allspice joins forces with bourbon in this spicy yet refreshing drink.
recipe:
- Bourbon: 2 oz
- Lime Juice: 1/2 oz
- Allspice Dram: 1/2 oz
- Simple Syrup: 1/2 oz
- Agnostura Bitters: 1 dash

Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a glass.

title: Classic Manhattan
recipe:
- Bourbon: 3 oz
- Sweet Vermouth: 1 1/2 oz
- Grenadine or Maraschino Cherry Juice: 1/2 oz
- Agnostura Bitters: 2 dashes

Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and strain into a glass.

title: Old Fashioned
recipe:
- Bourbon: 2 oz
- Simple Syrup: 1/2 oz
- Agnostura Bitters: 2 dashes
- Orange peel

Combine ingredients in a glass. Twist orange peel, coat rim and inside of glass before adding. Stir and add ice.

title: Planter's Punch
description: Rum and fruit juices so you can sip your cares away.
recipe:
- Rum: 2 oz
- Orange Juice: 1 1/6 oz
- Pineapple Juice: 1 1/6 oz
- Lemon Juice: 2/3 oz
- Grenadine: 1/3 oz
- Agnostura Bitters: 3 dashes

Combine ingredients in a shaker with ice. Shake and pour into a glass.
